name: Kidnapped By Shadows - TEASER DEMO
description:
Kidnapped By Shadows TEASER DEMO

Description:

Kidnapped by Shadows is the both dark and exiting adventure of finding out what happened to your brother after he mysteriously vanishes... After a devastating argument between you the night before, he is no where to be seen the next morning, his room destroyed, you have little information. From then on you have only one ambition, to unfold this mystery.

Developers Note:

This is just an idea at this stage and I would love to start developing the full game, I would really appreciate any feedback!

- Kersey (Jared Kerswell)
